attributes.action: get the pelican in st james park london, that ate a pigeon, a sandwich
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: on Sunday 7th August 2005 an either very hungry or very psychotic pelican residing in st james park london swallowed whole pigeon live  i propose that someone track it down and give it a sandwich as it clearly needs one i suggest a ploughmans or BLT however given its taste for poultry it may prefere chicken i am starting a whole campaign to get that pelican a sandwich the video is on you tube unfortuatly i am not allowed to give you the url or web address but it really is not hard to find it will take about five minutes

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
